attr.title: Gunpowder on The Teeth: Arcade
attr.desc: Mega hardcore! In this game you will receive damage first, and only then you will locate the enemy. The implementation of military operations in the classic mechanics of platformer.
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam and copy all game files into the assets folder. You can also use the free demo. Devices with RK3326 CPU are not recommended due to frequent slowdowns.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/994860/Gunpowder_on_The_Teeth_Arcade/) and copy all game files into the `assets` folder. You can also use the free demo. Devices with `RK3326` CPU are not recommended due to frequent slowdowns.
